body:
> Also fixes #17027 with a cherry-pick, and bump the manpages.

Not against this, but FWIW: we don't usually do translation updates on master between major releases.
(there are no transifex translations for master)
That wasn't what I meant, it's fine to do it once (as there was really an issue here). Just didn't want to encourage it as a regular thing. But okay.
Yeah, sorry. I will leave the translations to you https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/17027#issuecomment-538471355 and just bump the gitian desc here

<!--a722867cd34abeea1fadc8d60700f111-->
